message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. This is a great price considering its value to you. I'm confident we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. However, $950,000 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $975,000.  This is a fair price, considering the value the product holds for you. Let's close this deal!
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $925,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand we're both trying to find a price that works for both of us.  I'm willing to go down to $960,000. This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident this price will be beneficial for both of us.  Let's get this deal done!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $920,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
